original_title: Michael Palin: A Life on Screen
overview: In this documentary, Michael Palin tells the story behind his success, after being honoured with a special award at the Baftas in 2013. With an outstanding career in television and film, this special delves into the archives to showcase some of Michael's incredible work, featuring an in-depth interview with the man himself.
title: Michael Palin: A Life on Screen
